raw_body: PERUSINGHE – KESHINI – Wife of late Haritha,​ mother of Dulantha,​ mother-in-law of Onella,​ daughter of late Herbert (Bertie) and Ethal Perera,​ sister of late Nilanthi Sirisena,​ daughter-in-law of Henry and Sona. Cortege leaves residence 50,​ Perera Mawatha,​ Panadura,​ on Saturday 14th October at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at Minuwanpitiya Cemetery at 5 p.m. No flowers please. Donations to any charity of your choice.066347
